-- predefined type, no DDL - MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY

-- predefined type, no DDL - XMLTYPE

CREATE TABLE nv_src_city (
    cityid              INTEGER,
    cityname            VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    citypopulation      INTEGER NOT NULL,
    nv_src_region_regid INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE nv_src_city ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_city_pk PRIMARY KEY ( cityid );

CREATE TABLE nv_src_customer (
    custid               INTEGER NOT NULL,
    custfirstname        VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    custlastname         VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    custdateofbirth      DATE NOT NULL,
    custaddress          VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    custphone            VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    nv_src_c_nv_src_c_id NUMBER NOT NULL,
    nv_src_c_cityid      INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE nv_src_customer ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_customer_pk PRIMARY KEY ( custid );

CREATE TABLE nv_src_order (
    orderid                INTEGER NOT NULL,
    orderdate              DATE NOT NULL,
    orderstatus            VARCHAR2(20 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    nv_src_customer_custid INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE nv_src_order ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_order_pk PRIMARY KEY ( orderid );

CREATE TABLE nv_src_orderitem (
    oitemid              INTEGER NOT NULL,
    oitemquantity        NUMBER(6, 2) NOT NULL,
    nv_src_order_orderid INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE nv_src_orderitem ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_orderitem_pk PRIMARY KEY ( oitemid,
                                                                              nv_src_order_orderid );

CREATE TABLE nv_src_product (
    prodid                     INTEGER NOT NULL,
    prodname                   VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    prodprice                  NUMBER(8, 2) NOT NULL,
    prodfamily                 VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    prodproducer               VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    nv_src_orderitem_oitemid   INTEGER NOT NULL,
    nv_src_oi_nv_src_o_orderid INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE nv_src_product ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_product_pk PRIMARY KEY ( prodid );

CREATE TABLE nv_src_region (
    regid      INTEGER NOT NULL,
    regname    VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    regcountry VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    countryid  INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE nv_src_region ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_region_pk PRIMARY KEY ( regid );

CREATE TABLE nv_src_salesperson (
    spid                   INTEGER NOT NULL,
    spfirstname            VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL,
    splastname             VARCHAR2(30 CHAR),
    sphiredate             DATE NOT NULL,
    nv_src_customer_custid INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE nv_src_salesperson ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_salesperson_pk PRIMARY KEY ( spid );

ALTER TABLE nv_src_city
    ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_city_nv_src_region_fk FOREIGN KEY ( nv_src_region_regid )
        REFERENCES nv_src_region ( regid );

ALTER TABLE nv_src_customer
    ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_customer_nv_src_city_fk FOREIGN KEY ( nv_src_c_cityid )
        REFERENCES nv_src_city ( cityid );

ALTER TABLE nv_src_order
    ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_o_nv_src_cust_fk FOREIGN KEY ( nv_src_customer_custid )
        REFERENCES nv_src_customer ( custid );

ALTER TABLE nv_src_orderitem
    ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_oi_nv_src_o_fk FOREIGN KEY ( nv_src_order_orderid )
        REFERENCES nv_src_order ( orderid );

ALTER TABLE nv_src_product
    ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_p_nv_src_oi_fk FOREIGN KEY ( nv_src_orderitem_oitemid,
                                                       nv_src_oi_nv_src_o_orderid )
        REFERENCES nv_src_orderitem ( oitemid,
                                      nv_src_order_orderid );

ALTER TABLE nv_src_salesperson
    ADD CONSTRAINT nv_src_sp_nv_src_customer_fk FOREIGN KEY ( nv_src_customer_custid )
        REFERENCES nv_src_customer ( custid );
